accordion.title: How I Work
accordion.intro: In this section, I explain how I organize each project: from the workflow and payment methods to the final review and the delivery of the fully published website. My goal is to make every stage clear and straightforward, ensuring the final result reflects exactly what you need.
accordion.p1: Each project is carried out in a fully personalized way, tailored to the client‚Äôs needs and goals. Before getting started, we define the scope, content, and delivery timelines.
accordion.p2: The project is carried out with a 50% upfront payment and the remaining 50% upon completion, before the website is published or the final files are delivered.
accordion.p3: Payments can be made in Argentine pesos (ARS) at the exchange rate of the day, or in US dollars (USD) through the agreed methods (bank transfer / Mercado Pago).
accordion.p4: One or two rounds of minor adjustments are included (depending on the service) once the design or functional version of the website is presented. Changes outside the initial scope can be quoted separately.
accordion.p5: The hosting and domain service can be managed either through the developer or directly by the client. If the hosting is provided by the developer, the corresponding cost of the selected plan will be charged.
accordion.p6: The final delivery is completed once the full project payment has been made. If the client uses their own hosting, the files are delivered ready to upload. If managed hosting is contracted, the website is published directly.
